title: Kiss Person Person

nouns: A symbol of romance and partnership.

description: A ropersontic kiss between two people, often depicting a couple sharing a tender and affectionate moment. It's a universal symbol of love and intimacy.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss: person, person emoji beautifully captures a moment of tender affection with its soft, rounded forms and gentle gradients. The faces of the two individuals are subtly rendered to express closeness and warmth, framed by delicate shading that hints at a loving embrace. The overall design, with its signature Apple polish and realistic lighting, evokes intimacy and romantic connection, making it a perfect way to express love or deep affection in messages.
